translator.expression
Interface ConstantDomain

All Superinterfaces:
BasicDomain, Domain
All Known Subinterfaces:
IntRange
All Known Implementing Classes:
BoolDomain, BoundedIntRange, ConstantArrayDomain, MultipleIntRange, SingleIntRange, SparseIntRange
public interface ConstantDomain
extends BasicDomain

This interface represents all domains that are composed of constants only. This includes boolean domains and all types of integer domains.

Author:
andrea

Method Detail

getRange

int[] getRange()
Get the range of the domain. This is either a lower and an upper bound or a sparse domain or a mixture of it (depending on the type of domain)

Returns:
the range of the domain. This is either a lower and an upper bound or a sparse domain or a mixture of it (depending on the type of domain)

getFullDomain

int[] getFullDomain()
Returns:
the domain represented by an ordered list of all values that are in the domain (instead of an lowerbound-upperbound representation.)
